package.name: slic3r_coverage_planner_msgs
package.description:
Message and service definitions for the Slic3r-based coverage planner.
Contains: - Path message for coverage path segments (outline vs fill) - PlanPath service for generating coverage plans
Supports linear and concentric fill patterns for mowing area coverage.
Ported from open_mower_ros (ROS1) to ROS2.
package.author: Clemens Elflein
